title: Football Fundamentals
description: Essential football skills for beginners covering basic techniques, ball control, and fitness.

exercises.name: Ball Control Drills
exercises.description: Practice controlling the ball with both feet using various surfaces

exercises.name: Passing Practice
exercises.description: Short and long passing techniques with accuracy focus

exercises.name: Dribbling Cones
exercises.description: Navigate through cones to improve agility and ball control

title: Basketball Skills Development
description: Intermediate basketball program focusing on shooting, dribbling, and defensive skills.

exercises.name: Free Throw Practice
exercises.description: Consistent free throw shooting with proper form

exercises.name: Defensive Slides
exercises.description: Lateral movement drills for better defensive positioning

exercises.name: Three-Point Shooting
exercises.description: Practice shooting from various three-point positions

title: Sprint & Field Mastery
description: Advanced athletic training for sprint and field events with power development.

exercises.name: Sprint Intervals
exercises.description: High-intensity interval training for speed development

exercises.name: Plyometric Training
exercises.description: Explosive power exercises for improved athletic performance

exercises.name: Long Jump Technique
exercises.description: Technical training for long jump approach and landing

title: Handball Basics
description: Learn fundamental handball techniques including throwing, catching, and team tactics.

exercises.name: Throwing Accuracy
exercises.description: Practice various throwing techniques for goal scoring

exercises.name: Catching Drills
exercises.description: Improve hand-eye coordination and catching skills

exercises.name: Court Movement
exercises.description: Basic positioning and movement patterns on court

title: Hockey Skills Enhancement
description: Intermediate hockey training focusing on stick handling, shooting, and game strategy.

exercises.name: Stick Handling
exercises.description: Advanced stick control and puck manipulation drills

exercises.name: Shooting Practice
exercises.description: Wrist shots, slap shots, and accuracy training

exercises.name: Skating Drills
exercises.description: Power skating and agility on ice

title: Kabaddi Combat Training
description: Advanced kabaddi techniques including raiding, defending, and team coordination.

exercises.name: Raiding Techniques
exercises.description: Advanced raiding strategies and escape methods

exercises.name: Defensive Holds
exercises.description: Master various defensive holds and tackles

exercises.name: Chain Formation
exercises.description: Team coordination and chain defensive strategies
